title: OSE-80-RemovalRequest
description: Movement Order request to move the detainee(s) from their current holding location to the appropriate airport terminal

quoteRef.description: Unique Id generated for this quote request (the OSE booking request id)

bookingId.description: Booking ID OR Itinerary Number issued by the GDS (Global distribution systems - travel networking systems used by travel agencies)

movementRef.description: Unique Id generated for this movement request

journeyRef.description: Unique Id generated for all moves linked to a particular journey

reason.description: Reason e.g. Transfer to Another Detention Facility - Interview

movementType.description: An optional movement type we receive from Atlas. It is not used

movementDetails.description: The details of the movement request

subject.description: The person/s who needs to be escorted

additionalInformation.description: Extra information for agent. For e.g. Baggage needs to be collected en-route

subject.description: Subject details. person Id is always present. Mostly HO OR Port Reference is present

ceprReference.description: Person id found in the cid which is the same as CEPR from Atlas

uan.description: Unique Application Number will be allocated at the point of entry into the immigration system. E.g. 1212-0099-0039-4065

portReference.description: Port Reference Number if present. Used in case of transport from Ferry etc

firstName.description: Given Name of the subject including any middle name

lastName.description: Family Name of the subject. May be known or not

aliases.description: Alternative Names of the subject if any

nationality.description: Nationality of the person from CID. e.g. Angola, British Citizen

dateOfBirth.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format yyyy-MM-dd. Is it mandatory?

risksPosed.description: Risks can be Medical or Non-Medical and both will be captured here

languages.description: Languages spoken or understood by the returnee that may assist transportation

references.description: Any references that are required. For e.g. IFB Reference

notes.description: Person specific notes applicable to the returnee

movementDate.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format of [YYYY]-[MM]-[DD]T[hh]:[mm] e.g. 2018-05-01T08:37:12Z

movementType.description: Type of movement as identified in the CID

reason.description: Reason e.g. Transfer to Another Detention Facility - Interview

from.description: Manually entered address where the Journey starts if address not found in pickupLocation

to.description: Manually entered address where the Journey ends if address not found in dropOffLocation

additionalInformation.description: Movement Order Comments or any information that will help escorts

departureDetails.description: This is applicable where movement type is 'Removals'

departureDateTime.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format of [YYYY]-[MM]-[DD]T[hh]:[mm]:[ss] e.g. 2018-05-01T08:37:12Z

destination.description: The country to which the subject is going to or being taken

flightNumber.description: The flight details of the subject

shipNumber.description: The ship details of the subject

groupDetails.description: The details of a group move movement request

riskCode.description: This will be the DS Risk code e.g. DEMC, DE

riskDescription.description: DS descriptions for the codes e.g. DS: Existing Medical Condition, DS: Escape Risk

riskStartDate.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format of YYYY-MM-DD for when the risk starts

riskEndDate.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format of YYYY-MM-DD for when the risk ends

additionalInformation.description: Agent entered information e.g. High BP, Burglary etc.

depmuNotes.description: This will be the depmu notes

reference.description: Any references associated with the returnee that caseworker decides to shared with CWT and Mitie OSE Team

code.description: Unique Reference Code e.g. NOMSREF, HO_FILE_REF etc

referenceValue.description: Value assigned to the returnee for the code. e.g. V34543587

shortDescription.description: Short Description for the codes e.g. NOMS Reference

longDescription.description: Long Description for the codes e.g. National Offender Management System (NOMS) Reference

creationDate.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format yyyy-MM-dd when the reference is created

expiryDate.description: Date in the ISO-8601 format yyyy-MM-dd when the reference is expiring

requester.description: Details of the requester initiating the request

groupName.description: Group name to which the requester belongs

groupEmail.description: Group email of the team to which the requester belongs

groupTelephone.description: Group telephone number of the requester

groupRef.description: Unique Id generated for all moves linked to a particular group move

groupType.description: Indicates if Family or other group move

groupTotal.description: Defines total number of group members
